body_html:
Good to know, thank you @vadimkantorov .

I got an answer to this problem on the forum. I did not try it yet as it requires last version (v0.3), but from the spec this is precisely what I need, so I will close this issue for now !

Thanks to the community

http://pytorch.org/docs/master/tensors.html#torch.Tensor.put_

body:
Good to know, thank you @vadimkantorov .

I got an answer to this problem on the [forum](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/indexing-with-repeating-indices-numpy-add-at/10223/12). I did not try it yet as it requires last version (v0.3), but from the spec this is precisely what I need, so I will close this issue for now ! 

Thanks to the community

http://pytorch.org/docs/master/tensors.html#torch.Tensor.put_
